rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance with wheelchair-accessible design and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Bohemian style living area with open floor plan suitable for joint family gatherings; includes a central seating area and integrated storage.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for communal dining in an open-plan setup; features Bohemian decor elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with wheelchair-accessible countertops and layout optimized for movement; includes island seating.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet, cozy library space designed for reading and relaxation; incorporates natural light and soft Bohemian touches.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Private living area for staff with a bedroom and small kitchenette; designed to be functional and accessible.

openings.description: Main entry door; wide opening for wheelchair access.
Large windows providing natural light and ventilation, ensuring Vastu compliance with south-eastern exposure.
Accessible door connecting to the dining area; designed for easy movement and wheelchair passage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with accessible layout; includes en-suite bathroom designed per accessibility standards.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for joint family members, wheelchair accessible with easy-to-navigate corridors.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for joint family members, featuring natural light and Bohemian decor elements.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: General bathroom with accessible design; includes grab bars and wide doorways.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible lift integrated next to staircase; ensures safe vertical circulation for joint family members.
Large windows providing natural light, placed according to Vastu principles in the northeast direction.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters (Upper)
rooms.description: Additional space for servants; includes a compact bathroom and storage, ensuring accessibility.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Multi-purpose guest bedroom that can serve as an extra bedroom or study area; incorporates Bohemian decor with natural ventilation.

openings.description: Accessible door leading to private outdoor space, ensuring easy movement for wheelchair users.
Ventilation window placed according to Vastu norms in the west direction.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Outdoor swimming pool area with surrounding deck; designed to be wheelchair accessible via ramps and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Pool Deck
rooms.description: Open-air deck adjacent to the pool for relaxation and family gatherings, featuring Bohemian decor elements.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible ramp leading from the pool deck to ground level.
Accessible door connecting the deck area with the main living areas.
